name: Disconnected (Ep3)
description:
Disclaimer:

If it's stuck on 2% just wait a little longer, it's normal.

If you haven't played the first two episodes, do so here:

https://geqwe.itch.io/disconnected

https://geqwe.itch.io/disconnected-ep2

Description:

A fugitive detective works as a taxi driver when a client provides him an intriguing offer.

Controls:

WASD to move

[Esc] to open controls and hints

[Q] , [E] to change stations

[C] to change camera

[L-Click] to pick up/drink

[R-Click] to put down

A game created by Giorgos Kletsas

Music Composer:

Iestyn Haberfield

https://soundcloud.com/iestyn-marcus-haberfield

itch.io: Iestyn Marcus Music

Voice acting:

 (John): https://www.fiverr.com/mr_andrewjones

(Tom): WanderingVoiceActor

Chill Station:

Dj Quads SoundCloud: https://soundcloud.com/aka-dj-quads ,Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/djquads/, Twitter: https://mobile.twitter.com/djquads,Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCfiS... ,Curated by : https://www.youtube.com/user/Muzictom...

Menu Song: Zeeky Beats: Past Night

Rate and comment for feedback.

This is the last episode to the series, created in seven days for the Brackeys 2021.1 game jam.
